package.name: data_collect
package.description: The package to collect data from different sensors. Supported data types: - pointcloud2 saved -> timestamp.pcd - Image saved -> timestamp.jpg - Imu saved -> timestamp.txt - Float64 saved -> timestamp.txt - NavSatFix saved -> timestamp.txt - Float32Stamped saved -> timestamp.txt - Odometry saved -> timestamp.txt
package.author: Abdullah Yusefi
